content: The queen has the ability to move as much as if she were a rook, that is, over the rows and columns, as if she were a bishop, that is, over the diagonals.
translations: ita:La donna ha la capacità di muoversi come se fosse una torre, cioè su file e colonne, e come se fosse un alfiere, cioè su
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
